Texts.Chs: 在[已编辑]和重访附近的叶族人部落之后，我发现了一个令人惊讶的部落传统。他们已经习惯把他们的[已编辑]称为“绿手指” 显然，它也不仅仅局限于那个部落。整个星球上的部落——就像我很快了解到的那样，这个星区几乎所有的其他部落——也都开始了这种习惯。
Texts.Eng: After [REDACTED] and revisiting a nearby Floran tribe, I discovered a surprising trend that had arisen in tribal tradition. They have taken to calling their [REDACTED] 'Greenfingers.' It apparently was not limited to that one tribe either. Tribes all over the planet - and as I shortly learned, nearly every other tribe across this sector - have also taken up the practice.

Texts.Chs: 绿手指的笔记: 叶族的绿手指们
我不确定这个传统是作为一种早已被遗忘的奉承形式，还是仅仅因为他们在这些冗长的[已编辑]之后把我的名字与聪明联系在一起。不管怎样，我不能说我对这种做法完全不满意。我似乎在我的人民的历史上留下了永久的印记。
Texts.Eng: I am not certain if the tradition was undertaken as some long-forgotten form of flattery or simply because they associate my name with being clever, after these long [REDACTED]. Either way, I cannot say I am entirely displeased with the practice. It would seem I have left a lasting mark upon the history of my people.

Texts.Chs: 现在下结论可能还为时过早，但是这种发展可能预示着在没有大地守护团的情况下，叶族人人真正的文明将会出现。
Texts.Eng: It may be premature to say, but perhaps this development might herald the emergence of true civilization amongst the Floran in the absence of the Protectorate.

Texts.Chs: 绿手指的部落角色似乎与部落首领截然不同，尽管杰出的叶族人偶尔两者兼具。绿手指似乎扮演者一个异常聪明，技术熟练的萨满，我甚至观察到证据表明，他们彼此通信，几乎作为部落的使节。
Texts.Eng: The tribal role of Greenfinger appears to be distinct from that of Tribesmaster, although exceptional Florans might occasionally be both. Greenfingers seem to serve as exceptionally clever, technically proficient shamen, and I have even seen evidence that they correspond with one another, acting almost as tribal envoys.
